comment.author: Paul
comment.text: You got my vote.But now just stop letting her get to you.Tell us about bringing jobs back.I lost my job with Chrysler after 13 years because of Obama.Stay focused and let Americans know how and what your going to do for America and WIN this election.I like you tell it how it is.But you have alot of people to win over.And you gotta do it now and stop fighting with her.GO Donald J. Trump

replies.text: WHATEVER YOU DO - I BEG YOU - DO NOT GOOGLE " TRUMP CHILD RAPE "
